desc: Welcome to Bangor's online store. Select from our range of award-winning Bangor wines, gifts and gift vouchers for delivery to your door. Join our Wine Club.

layout.text: Visit Bangor Vineyard Shed Today. Open 11am-5pm, 7 days for wine tasting. Restaurant under renovation. Limited light menu on weekends only. Drop in for tastings. Call 62 535 558 for weekend table bookings.
